# DateTimeOffsetUtility.ToIso8601 method

Formats the date in the standard ISO 8601 format.

```csharp
public static string ToIso8601(this DateTimeOffset date)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| date | The date to format. |

## Return Value

The formatted date.
